__e: And somewhere in those pages Is the answer to where he'll strike next.
Still doesn't tell us where he's gonna hit, though.
Lately, I've been filled with the knowledge that the killer will strike again.
The guy is gonna strike again, and when he does, you need to be ready.
They'll make a mistake eventually, and when they do, we will pounce and drain the first person we can get our teeth on.
I decided that people like that... who could beat up people... then cry for themselves and those they'd hurt,... were people nobody needed.
